p: The metastasis of Colon26-Luc cells in lungs was also examined by bioluminescence imaging. In control group, signal emission from lungs was detected in nine out of thirteen mice ( Figure 4A), i.e., 69.2% incidence of metastasis was observed ( Figure 4A). Mice received Tricin-H and FOLFOX treatments resulted in lower metastasis incidence, which were 46.2% (6 out of 13 mice) and 41.7% (5 out of 12 mice), respectively ( Figure 4A). The average radiance of lungs in Tricin-H and FOLFOX groups was significantly reduced when compared to the untreated control group ( p < 0.05, Figure 4B). Although the metastasis incidence in lungs from Tricin-L-treated group was high, the overall signal emission was still lower than that of untreated control group ( Figure 4B).
